attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Long gone are the days when MP existed to provide a public service for next to nothing - mostly pride in serving the country to better it. We took a wrong turn somewhere and its time to start trying to head in the morally right direction. 
There is no need for MP's to claim expenses, they earn far more then most as it is. Furthermore, it is utterly perposterous to claim that expenses are private - its public money, its a public matter!
Either completely abolish expenses or complete transparency of every single penny. Like in the real world, not MP's dream world! They're in a VERY privileged position FOR THE PUBLIC, not the other way around as it seems right now.

rejection.details:
Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.

MPs' expenses are a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
